    • Method Detail

      • getAvatar

        @GET("v1/avatar")
retrofit2.Call<AvatarResponse> getAvatar()

      • getMetadata

        @GET("v1/avatar/metadata")
retrofit2.Call<AvatarMetadata> getMetadata()

      • getAvatarRule

        @GET("v1/avatar-rules")
retrofit2.Call<AvatarRule> getAvatarRule()
        Returns:
        Avatar Rule
        ImplNote:
        BodyColorsPalette is a list of valid brickColors you can choose for your avatar. WearableAssetTypes contains a list of asset types with names, ids, and the maximum number that you can wear at a time. Does not include packages because they cannot be worn on your avatar directly. PlayerAvatarTypes are the types of avatars you can choose between.

      • getUserAvatar

        @GET("v1/users/{userid}/avatar")
retrofit2.Call<AvatarResponse> getUserAvatar​(@Path("userId")
                                             long userId)

      • getCurrentlyWearing

        @GET("v1/users/{userid}/currently-wearing")
retrofit2.Call<AssetIds> getCurrentlyWearing​(@Path("userId")
                                             int userId)

      • getOutfits

        @GET("v1/users/{userid}/outfits")
retrofit2.Call<OutfitResponse> getOutfits​(@Path("userId")
                                          int userId,
                                          @Query("page")
                                          int page,
                                          @Query("itemsPerPage")
                                          int itemsPerPage,
                                          @Query("isEditable")
                                          boolean isEditable)

      • removeAsset

        @POST("/v1/avatar/assets/{assetId}/remove")
retrofit2.Call<Boolean> removeAsset​(@Path("assetId")
                                    long assetId)

      • wearAsset

        @POST("/v1/avatar/assets/{assetId}/wear")
retrofit2.Call<Boolean> wearAsset​(@Path("assetId")
                                  long assetId)

      • redrawThumbnail

        @POST("/v1/avatar/redraw-thumbnail")
retrofit2.Call redrawThumbnail()

      • setBodyColors

        @POST("/v1/avatar/set-body-colors")
retrofit2.Call<Boolean> setBodyColors​(@Body
                                      BodyColorModel bodyColorsModel)

      • setAvatarType

        @POST("/v1/avatar/set-player-avatar-type")
retrofit2.Call<Boolean> setAvatarType​(@Body
                                      PlayerAvatarTypeModel playerAvatarTypeModel)
        Parameters:
        playerAvatarTypeModel - model
        Returns:
        Success
        ImplNote:
        This is the avatar type chosen on the Avatar page. Some games can override this and force your character to be R6 or R15.

      • setScale

        @POST("/v1/avatar/set-scales")
retrofit2.Call<Boolean> setScale​(@Body
                                 Scale scalesModel)

      • setWearAssets

        @POST("v1/avatar/set-wearing-assets")
retrofit2.Call<WearAssetsResponse> setWearAssets​(@Body
                                                 AssetIds assetIdsModel)
        Parameters:
        assetIdsModel - model
        Returns:
        Invalid stuff
        ImplNote:
        Only allows items that you own, are not expired, and are wearable asset types. Any assets being worn before this method is called are automatically removed.
